Name: Equilibrium
About the game: This is an online FPS.Players are divided into two teams:'Human' and 'Ghost'.There are traditional gamemode like team death match witch is aimed at more kills and teamwork.We also have a gamemode called capture of flag.You need try to obtain the enemy's flag and protect yours.If you don't want to cooperate with others，The free for all can be suitable for you.The last one is a special mode called 'Equal'.In this gamemode，ghosts are weak first.What the should do is hide themselves and fuwen.At the same time，humans need to find out the ghosts and destroy the fuwen. If they failed to do that，there will be a counter strike.
Developers: 成华区拳膺软件开发工作室,贤德淡腾
Publishers: 成华区拳膺软件开发工作室
